original_title: エクスタシー刑事 ～特殊能力捜査官 冴子～
overview: Saeko (Airi Kijima), who was assigned to a top secret department where investigators with special abilities gathered because she was bought the ability to talk with the dead when she reached the climax in SEX It leads to a solution, but a difficult case occurs in which the true criminals are killed one after another just before the arrest.
title: Ecstasy Deka: Tokushu Nouryoku Sousakan Saeko
